data.name: Book of Yog Idle RPG
data.detailed_description:
From Game Developers

Book of Yog is a 3D idle RPG game presenting with Cel-Shading skills. We hope to make this game a rich-content and energy-saving idle & simulation game.

We've partially finished many systems such as role collection, line-up and skill combination, equipment manufacturing, resource allocation, and etc.. We want to provide much richer playing methods through continuous development in a few years.

We decide to make the game free to let players participate in the continuous production and improvement process. And we definitely need more feedbacks from players to help us improve current contents, such as translations, user experience, difficuly settings, and etc.. We do have in-game purchases for this game. Thank you for the understanding and support.

We will make sure keep on adding more mechanics for our full version, such as item codex, character index, story modes, simulation construction system, guild missions, job expansions, skill trees, and more. We will be adding/improving game modes at the same time, such as rest of unfinished modes in Misty Coast, Corrider, Map Expansion, Personalized Buildings, Home Mode with Favorability, Event Mode, and more. There will be more ideas coming out and we will post our new ideas when they comes out.

From the beginning of Early Access, we will keep updating every 2-3 weeks. We hope that we can add content steadily to the game for 3 years or even longer. We believe that stable updates bring healthy consumption mentality and endless joy to players.


Follow Us!

Welcome to follow us to learn the latest progress of Book of Yog:

  • Twitter: Book_of_Yog
  • Facebook: Book of Yog
  • Discord: https://discord.gg/CWqhwjVbSk


About the Game



*** For information about current state of the Early Access version, please refer to "From Game Developers" section in this page. ***

Recruit heroes, build a team, and explore an idle RPG with a depth strategy system!

Become the commander of “The blade of pioneers”, recruit the unique heroes of “Black Guard”, slay the vicious monsters from "Black Tide", defense the St.Nigar Great Wall, which is in precarious situation, explore the truth behind the surging undercurrent.

Experience an interesting and relax idle RPG, there are various of heroes, skill books, gears and loots are waiting for you to capture, and you can build the strongest team with most powerful heroes.


Main feature


  • Idle system
Experience an easier idle RPG! You can gain materials even off-line, and don't need to waste time in meaningless battle. Facilitate the growth of your team, to enjoy the game quickly!

  • Heroes
More than 30 heroes are waiting for you to recruit, and more heroes are waiting to join the game. There are 6 unique class waiting for you to select: Warrior, Tank, Archer, Assassin, Mage, Support. Each class has its own unique and special growth system and talents tree. As an RPG enthusiast, you mustn't miss it!



  • Strategy System
Experience the rich game strategy system, select both of the items, skills, talents, characters freely to make a perfect combination. Create your own unique hero!

  • Skill Combination
Each hero has unique skill trees and talents, collect special skill books to customize your heroes' skill system. Fell freely to collect, learn and combine. And create a most fun and powerful hero to improve the combat strategy and the fun of the game!

  • Team Formation
Assemble a team with 6 "Black Guards" to fight for you. With the various team formation which can activate different effects, you can create a unique and powerful team freely. As long as you deploy the best heroes and classes in your team, even the team is consists of only 6 guards or 6 supports, it can also be victory in every battle!

  • Random System
Explore the wildness, battlefields, and dungeons, and slay the monsters to get thousands of unique loots, all of which are randomly generated. Every battle is an unexpected gain and experience!

  • Loot System
Experience an easy and fun loot system, no need to invest too much effort, and no need to P2W. Whether gears, props, loots, or even heroes can be gain easily.

  • Sand-box System
You can DIY your own camp with the sand-box construct system, enjoy a fun and relax game experience! (Under development, not released yet)

And more game contents will be published with our continuously update, please stay tuned!

data.short_description: The Book of Yog is a 3D idle RPG game presenting with Cel-Shading skills. You can rally heroes, develop the kingdom and explore secrets of the lost world. Dozens of heroes, hundreds of skills, thousands of equipment, free combinations, come and form the most powerful team that belongs to you!
